data.text: @varsitySped @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica Same place, using the zoom feature. Try harder.
@JC_Ravenspyre @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica Idk where you got your chart from. But this is from the EIA https://t.co/3Yz3O3gX78

@varsitySped @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica Several things, for starters the price of crude collapsed because of the US over producing oil in a fear of sanctions against Tehran, second, fact checking gas buddy, the US average fell to $2.17 at the end of 2019, not $1.74 in the middle. https://t.co/OgSTTQsDRw

@varsitySped @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica If you think 1/29 is not 2019? Also that's when the polar vortex and a state of emergency was declared to, and btw, it's called covid-19 because that's the year it was discovered. You see that point in 6/4, that's the drop. Try again.
@JC_Ravenspyre @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica The rest of the world was not getting hit by the pandemic in 2018

@varsitySped @trollwrap @AdeIica @redknight1993 @MargBarAmerica Yea, because that was when the rest of the world was starting to get hit by the pandemic, and there was that big fear going on. But how coincidental again you missed that portion before.
